I've further improved my item pipe design, to be able to retrive items. This insert node will try to retrive items from via pipes connected containers and place them in the inventory the node was placed on.
This process is rather slow and only one item at a time is tranfered from the connected containers, to prevent them from getting stuck in the pipes.
Configuration: Using the Scrench I'm able to configure every side of a pipe segment, so I can prevent it from connecting with this side. (§lright click§r on desired side)
